tactics: Stealing of GitHub Personal Access Tokens and API keys
Automated spreading to infect other packages
Initial access via compromised maintainer account
Malware deployment to scan for sensitive credentials
Uploading stolen credentials to public repositories
intelligence.summary: CISA warned organizations about a supply chain compromise involving Shai-Hulud, a self-replicating worm that infected over 500 packages, targeting credentials like PATs and API keys. 黑客通过在开发人员依赖的软件构建块中植入恶意代码，发动了一种新型的供应链攻击，这种攻击还能够自我复制并传播。
